title: Thor's Mjolnir - My second design on Blender
snippet: Hello there.In the previous post I shared the first 3D model I ever make on Blender: The Captain America’s shield.I had to keep practicing and my second design idea would also make the Marvel fanbase proud: I choose to model Thor’s Mjolnir.For this project I watched some Youtube tutorial again. title: My first 3D Model - Captain America's Shield
snippet: Hello there.This is my first post so I decided to share the first thing I ever make on Blender, Cap’s shield. Surely I got I lot of help from PRX 3D Youtube chanel (in Portuguese).Enjoy :) * use your mouse to rotate the camera
